alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 7:45PM MDT until August 01 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT/915 PM CDT/ FOR WEST CENTRAL TODD AND EAST CENTRAL BENNETT COUNTIES... At 744 PM MDT/844 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harrington, or 25 miles east of Martin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrington. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
